name: Earth Dragon Wyrmling
movement: walk 30 ft., fly 30 ft., burrow 40 ft.
description: A medium-sized dragon with earthy tones blending into rocky terrain, showcasing its unique bond to the land.
memorable: Can burrow seamlessly and become indistinguishable from rock, making it a formidable guardian of its territory.
goals: To protect its linked area and ambush intruders, linked to the essence of the land.
relations: Can be encountered alongside other earth-related creatures or as a protector of ancient landmarks.
environment: Typically found in rocky and earthen landscapes, especially near specific landmarks.
strengths: Has good physical attributes, damage resistance against nonmagical weapons, and a unique essence link to an area.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to magical weapons which can bypass its resistances.
attacks: Melee bite attack dealing significant piercing damage and a versatile breath weapon of sand and stones.
most_powerful_ability: Earth Glide, allowing it to burrow without detection and ambush effectively.
senses: Possesses tremorsense allowing it to detect movements through solid earth up to 30 feet away.
skills: Excels in athletics and has good insight and perception skills, aiding in ambush tactics.
additional_information: Immune to petrification, making it resilient against that condition.
Can create levels of fatigue and strife in its linked area upon death.
False Appearance ability allows it to blend in when motionless.
test_queries: dragon wyrmling that blends in with rocky terrain
medium dragon linked to the earth
wyrmling with powerful sand breath attack
